title: Pixel phone defaults to "Cast" volume when playing Spotify at home on Alexa devices.
content: I tell Alexa to play night-time music on my childrens' echo (via Spotify), and after that, the Pixel makes my volume buttons control THAT volume by default.  I can't find a way to disable, or even see that volume control except when I tap the hardware buttons.  Why would I want to control the echo's volume, I have Alexa for that, more importantly, how do I make it stop?
